cast.name: 约翰·佩特鲁奇 John Petrucci
詹姆斯·莱博瑞 James LaBrie
麦克·波特诺伊 Mike Portnoy

director.name: 麦克·波特诺伊 Mike Portnoy

this_title: Dream Theater - Score: 20th Anniversary World Tour Live with the Octavarium Orchestra
trans_title: 梦剧院乐队 二十周年纪念世界巡回演唱会
introduction: 梦剧院乐队发行的官方第五套双DVD现场实况。拍摄于2006年4月1日，在纽约的无线电城音乐厅。这场音乐会是他们20周年纪念巡演的最后一场，也被称为“梦幻剧乐队的一个特别夜晚”。演唱会的后半部分有一个完整的交响乐团，由Jamshied Sharifi指挥的“The Octavarium Orchestra”。内容为：DVD101"The Root of All Evil" – 9:3202"I Walk Beside You" – 4:1003"Another Won" – 5:4004"Afterlife" – 7:2805"Under a Glass Moon" – 7:2706"Innocence Faded" – 6:1607"Raise the Knife" – 11:5108"The Spirit Carries On" – 9:3709"Six Degrees of Inner Turbulence" – 41:2610"Vacant" – 3:0311"The Answer Lies Within" – 5:3612"Sacrificed Sons" – 10:3613"Octavarium" – 27:2914"Metropolis" – 11:1615Credits – 2:53DVD2"The Score So Far..." 20th Anniversary Documentary – 56:25Octavarium Animation – 3:06"Another Day" (Live in Tokyo – August 26, 1993) – 4:47"The Great Debate" (Live in Bucharest – July 4, 2002) – 13:37"Honor Thy Father" (Live in Chicago – August 12, 2005) – 9:47
chinese_title: 梦剧院乐队 二十周年纪念世界巡回演唱会
foreign_title: Dream Theater - Score: 20th Anniversary World Tour Live with the Octavarium Orchestra
